fields_of_interest: Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: GasNaturally takes a broad interest in Energy Union discussions and the 2030 Energy and Climate Framework (overall reduction of emissions; energy efficiency; renewable energy policy; power market design).
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: GasNaturally aims to showcase the essential role of natural gas in the energy system’s forthcoming transformation. The mitigation of climate change has become one of the most important issues for the gas industry.
